greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row length of the irregular triangle A246646 (sieved modified Collatz table).
example: Row n = 1 of A246646(n,m) is 2, 1 with length 2.
Row n = 14 for the starting number k = A246647(14) = 27 of the (modified) Collatz iteration has 60 entries in the sieved table A246646.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 02 2014
